title: Pantheon Q not hitting target
body: When charging the Q and throwing it, it hits the target but it does not register so it just goes through the champ with them taking 0 damage from  it. This has actually happened a few times to me already but I now I want to report it and see what happens.

replies.body: Does this happen in a replay?
Yes, it happens the same way in the replay as when it happened in the game.
Not a bug to my experience and knowledge. Its just that Pantheon's hit box for the thrown q is extremely super tiny. Pretty bs I know.
i think that is terrain dif or the back of velkoz tentacles does not count as a hit box
